vocabulary.英文例句: I live in a small apartment near the city center.

We need to protect our environment for future generations.
Pizza is my favorite food.
My grandfather tells me interesting stories about his childhood.

My mother is cooking dinner in the kitchen.
English is the most widely spoken language in the world.
Speaking two languages gives you an advantage in the job market.
His behavior in class was very respectful.
It's important to communicate clearly with your colleagues.
Making this decision was very difficult for me.
I love all fruits, especially apples and oranges.
She frequently visits her grandmother on weekends.
The government announced new policies to help students.
Each student has individual learning needs.

It's necessary to wear a helmet when riding a bicycle.
